tweet: Today, border officials in AZ announced they made their biggest fentanyl bust ever at a legal port of entry.  Remind me how a wall would have stopped close to 300 pounds of the deadly opioid from entering the country. #NoMoreShutdowns  https://wapo.st/2TlpJ6l

Due to Arctic temperatures in the region, my District offices are again closed today. Offices are expected to reopen tomorrow. Stay inside. If you must go outside, avoid prolonged exposure to the cold. Click the link for winter safety tips from the CDC. https://bit.ly/2fyMTlV

If women & men do the same job, they should get the same pay.    
It’s time to make #EqualPay the law of the land – so let’s pass the #PaycheckFairness Act.

Countless students attend school in crumbling buildings that are unsafe and not equipped with essential resources.  The Rebuild America’s School Act would invest more than $100 billion to improve public schools across the country.  #BuildSchoolsNotWalls
I’m proud to support the #PaycheckFairness Act, because #EqualPay is crucial to building a stronger economy. pic.twitter.com/SFMZpABYFu

The Rebuild America’s School Act helps not only our students, but also our economy. By investing more than $100 billion in  school infrastructure, this bill would create 1.9 million good-paying jobs for local workers. #BuildSchoolsNotWalls

Every student, regardless of their family’s wealth, should have access to a safe, welcoming, and high-quality public school. That’s why I’m co-sponsoring the Rebuild America’s Schools Act. #BuildSchoolsNotWalls
Due to inclement weather and extreme temperatures, my District offices are closed today.  Offices are expected to resume regular business on Thursday.  Stay inside and be safe.

As Ohio and the rest of the Midwest brace for arctic temperatures this week, the City of Akron has four warming centers available Wednesday and Thursday.  See the image below for details. pic.twitter.com/aEuoUq7hhL

This week, Ohio and OH-11 will experience the coldest weather we’ve seen in two decades. Check on your family, families w/small children, and our seniors and bring pets inside.  Click and share the link below for safety tips & warming stations in the area.  https://bit.ly/2S9S3vs

Today, International Holocaust Remembrance Day, #WeRemember the six million Jewish victims and millions of others who suffered at the hands of Nazism.  Let this day be a reminder of why hatred and racism have no place in our democracy.

Reopening the government means our federal workers can pay their bills, feed their families and know their work and worth are appreciated as they deliver much needed services.  Let’s keep it that way.

Today, I voted for the 10th time to reopen the government while @POTUS & @SenateMajLdr continue to hold 800K federal workers hostage. RT if you agree it’s time to #EndTheShutdown and get federal employees back to work so they can receive the pay they are due.
Roe v. Wade means safety, dignity, autonomy, and economic security for many women. On this 46th anniversary, let’s celebrate and protect the right to choose. #FightForRoe #Roe46

Today, as we celebrate Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr., let us reflect on his dream for our nation and remember his words: “The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy.” pic.twitter.com/CUXiOEohsD

Families should stretch their benefit to last through all of February.  For tips on how to stretch your food budget, visit  https://cjfs.cuyahogacounty.us/en-US/benefits.aspx ….
Due the shutdown, February food stamps have been made available now.  You do not have to spend your benefits all at once.  They do not expire early. Don’t believe anything different.

Today, @RepDaveJoyce (R-OH) and I re-introduced the REACH Act of 2019. If signed into law, this bill will require colleges and universities to disclose hazing incidents in their Annual Security Report. This bill reopens the federal government through February 8 and ensures the government is open and operating to help meet the needs of disaster victims. #EndTheShutdown
